author: flo (tonebytone)
content:
Yes, a terrific balance. I like the bright yellow of the bike with the slightly less subdued orange on the poster. Plus the tiny bits of red and cyan in the background. The slight angle of the bike and the slight opposite angle of the poster's edge make a perfect V in the center.

I too thought the 2nd image was of a ship's mast! Until I looked at the larger version - but it's still reminiscent of a mast.
